org.spongepowered.api.stats

Interface StatisticBuilder.BlockStatisticBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StatisticBuilder
    Enclosing interface:
    StatisticBuilder

    public static interface StatisticBuilder.BlockStatisticBuilder
extends StatisticBuilder
    Represents a builder to create new and custom instances of BlockStatistics.
